segments.text: Good morning , Mr . Zhang , this is Jimmy calling from Polaroid Company .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I regret to tell you that the position of Sales Manager has gone to another person .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We really believe that you are a highly qualified person . But the other candidate has several years of related experiences .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Maybe that is true . But I am a fast learner and I am willing to work overtime , and I do not mind a lot of business travel .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can't you give me another chance and reconsider your decision ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am afraid we are sticking to our choice .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Possibly you are now . But in case you will change your mind , please let me know .
segments.speaker: S2
